column4: can grub be installed on a slave?  So windows on one drive and grub+ubuntu on a slave drive?
it looks like you have no need for grub there -- simply configure the windows bootloader for dual-boot
use windows boot loader to load ubuntu?
wouldn't you have to dump the /boot into C: ?
not necessary -- /boot remains on the slave drive, but the windows bootloader knows how to access that via an entry in c:\boot.ini
